title: New: Natasha Haws – Stranger
content:
Photo: Ian West

Having featured teenage prodigy Natasha Haws back in March of this year, she’s since taken some time off, perfecting her live show and prepping new single Stranger, set for release on 12 November through North East label Tiny Lights Recordings. Where Stepping Stone played upon the subtleties of Natasha’s voice, Stranger is a far bolder, more atmospheric number; toying with the booming, almost tribal-esque drum beats and providing a stark contrast to the delicate vocals of the North East’s fastest rising talent. Check it out below and purchase the single here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
